= Fosstrak LLRP Commander =

The LLRP Commander helps you configure and manage LLRP-compliant RFID readers.

Check out this [http://www.rfidjournal.com/article/view/4968 article] on the RFID Journal Website for a comprehensive summary of the LLRP Commander.
